title: VIDEO: SATELLITES – NEON SUN
content:
One of Rough Trade’s “Bands of the Month” in 2013, Satellites, have released a psychedelic, geometric, out-of-this-world video for their latest single “Neon Sun.

” The Yibi Hu created video interprets the sonic sounds into an extraterrestrial environment for this conceptual video that feels more like a narrative than an accompanying video. The video will make even the coldest heart wishing for summer. Such a tease with this relentless New York winter.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d20
